text: Deceived Slumming Party is a 1908 American silent comedy movie directed by D. W. GriffithDECEIVED SLUMMING PARTYCharles Keil. A Companion to D. W. Griffith and stars Edward Dillon, D. W. Griffith, and George Gebhardt. ==Actors== * Edward Dillon as Guide (as Eddie Dillon) * D. W. Griffith as Reginald O.C. Wittington * George Gebhardt as Chinese * Charles Inslee as Chinese * Anthony O'Sullivan as Chinese * Mack Sennett as Policeman / Waiter * Harry Solter as Chinese ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1908 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: Deceived Slumming Party
